snippet: Mel Watt, director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency, lays out modest plans to help potential home buyers.
abstract: Federal Housing Finance Agency director Mel Watt holds first on-the-record meeting with reporters since taking position, conveying impression that he is hesitant to make large changes in his role as overseer of Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac; plans and ideas Watt has advanced have generally been modest.
lead_paragraph: Mel Watt, director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency, lays out modest plans to help potential home buyers.

headline.main: Overseer of Fannie and Freddie Takes Cautious Steps to Strengthen Housing Market
headline.print_headline: Overseer of Fannie and Freddie Takes Cautious Steps to Strengthen Housing Market

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac)
